abstract: J. C. Flowers & Company has told its investors just how much money they may lose in the private equity firm’s battle over the buyout of Sallie Mae.
snippet: J. C. Flowers & Company has told its investors just how much money they may lose in the private equity firm’s battle over the buyout of Sallie Mae.
lead_paragraph: J. C. Flowers & Company has told its investors just how much money they may lose in the private equity firm’s battle over the buyout of Sallie Mae.

headline.main: Sallie Mae Battle Could Be Costly to Investors
headline.print_headline: Sallie Mae Battle Could Be Costly to Investors

byline.original: By Andrew Ross Sorkin and Michael J. de la Merced
